message:
Both unit tests and WF are capable of async/await.

I wrote an MSDN article on async unit testing: [https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn818493.aspx](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/magazine/dn818493.aspx)

I haven't done this recently, but async WF should be possible by using AsyncCodeActivity ([https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ee358731%28v=vs.110%29.aspx](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ee358731%28v=vs.110%29.aspx)) and converting from TAP to APM ([https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh873178(v=vs.110).aspx#TapToApm](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh873178(v=vs.110).aspx#TapToApm)).
